title: Wright Brothers National Memorial: Park Statistics
body: Park Statistics       Visitation There are several reporting systems and studies that document visitation statistics at Wright Brothers National Memorial:  Monthly and yearly visitation figures are available through the National Park Service Public Statistics Office. Wright Brothers National Memorial Visitor Survey Card Data Report (2010) Outer Banks Group, Wright Brothers National Memorial , Visitor Study (2002) Outer Banks Visitors Bureau Visitor Conversion Study (2003)
